Events that occurred on 8 October.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1920 - Translator Nils Werenskiold is born.
1937 â€“ C.S. Lewis reviews The Hobbit in The Times.
1979 - The Jackanory episode "Barrels Out of Bond" is aired on the BBC.
1987 - Inkling and biographer Roger Lancelyn Green dies.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at the Auditorium Theatre in Chicago, Illinois.
2009 - Hordes of the Things is released on CD.
2015 - The Art of The Lord of the Rings is published in the UK.
2017 - Binding Them All is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
With Frodo severely wounded, Strider and the four hobbits travel slowly towards Rivendell.
Gandalf hurries towards Rivendell after the Black Riders attacked him on Weathertop.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
